messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
See the potential of dragon Pokémon!
The Championship is within my sights!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: Potential doesn’t mean I can win...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
A Dragon Tamer Champion...I’ll need to train so much more to
even come close to coming close...
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’ve cranked up my dragon Pokémon’s
potential!I’ve been looking forward to seeing
you again!
